From: B.H., To: Ruby Chandler Postcard Info: The Pen-Art Publishing CO., Bloomington, Illinois Mailed from: Normal, Illinois on August 13, 1908

Miss Ruby Chandler Pearl, Illinois

Looked for a card here now but it came OK. Hope you enjoyed your visit. Did the "one" you met look good to you? I will be home midnight August 26. Wish I could com eon the moon train but can't. I have thought of you often since you journeyed up here. Yours as B.H.
